scripts.unlink: cd resources; if [ -h bin ]; then unlink bin; fi; cd ../
scripts.buildNativeApp: cd resources && pyarmor pack nativeApp.py && cd .. && cp -Rpv resources/dist/nativeApp ./dist/
scripts.buildNativeAppMac: cd resources && pyarmor pack -x--no-cross-protection nativeApp.py && cd .. && cp -Rpv resources/dist/nativeApp ./dist/
scripts.buildNativeAppNoArmor: cd resources && pyinstaller -F nativeApp.py && cd .. && mkdir dist/nativeApp && cp -Rv resources/dist/nativeApp ./dist/nativeApp
scripts.buildSystray: cd resources && pyarmor pack -e'-w --icon=assets/icon.xpm' systray.py && cd .. && cp -Rv resources/dist/systray ./dist/systray
scripts.buildSystrayMac: cd resources && pyarmor pack -x--no-cross-protection -e'-w --icon=assets/icon.xpm' systray.py && cd .. && cp -Rv resources/dist/systray.app ./dist/systray.app
scripts.build: rm -fr dist && mkdir dist && tar cf ./dist/node_modules.tar node_modules && cp -RLv ./resources/bin ./resources/install.sh ./resources/optract.json resources/extension_id.json resources/assets ./dist/ && cp -Rv ./dapps ./dist/ && mkdir ./dist/lib && cp -Rv lib/create.js lib/FileService.js lib/import.js lib/KnifeIron.js lib/slave.js lib/rpcserv ./dist/lib
scripts.prepack: rm -Rf Optract_release && mkdir Optract_release && mv dist Optract_release && cd Optract_release && ln -s dist/systray OptractGUI && cd ..
scripts.prepackMac64: rm -Rf Optract_release && mkdir Optract_release && mv dist Optract_release && cd Optract_release && ln -s dist/systray.app OptractGUI && cd ..
scripts.package: rm -f ./OptractClient.tar.gz && npm run prepack && tar -zcvf OptractClient.tar.gz ./Optract_release
scripts.packageMac64: rm -f ./OptractClient_mac64.tar.gz && npm run prepackMac64 && tar -zcvf OptractClient_mac64.tar.gz ./Optract_release
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run unlink && ln -s bin_linux64 ./resources/bin && npm run build && npm run buildNativeApp && npm run buildSystray && npm run package && npm run unlink
scripts.releaseMac64: npm run clean && npm run unlink && ln -s bin_darwin64 ./resources/bin  && npm run build && npm run buildNativeAppMac && npm run buildSystrayMac && npm run packageMac64 && npm run unlink
scripts.clean: rm -fr dist OptractClient.tar.gz OptractClient_*.tar.gz resources/dist resources/build
scripts.appInstall: tar xf ./OptractClient.tar.gz -C ../OptractClient && cd ../OptractClient/dist && ln -s ../ipfs_repo && cd dapps && ln -s ../../myArchive.bcup && ln -s ../../keystore
scripts.appUninstall: cd ../OptractClient/dist && unlink ./ipfs_repo && cd dapps && unlink ./myArchive.bcup && unlink ./keystore && cd ../.. && rm -fr ./dist
